comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Excellent, a little bit posed for a party but nonetheless a great shot.  That lad with the guitar in his shirt sleeves could have come from any town in Ireland.

comment.author: 95711690@N03
comment._content: It must've taken some wrangling to get these guys to pose.  You can see that they still kept their beer, and one guy is even pouring some more for a friend!
